contribution.label: Contribution
contribution.notes: Batch uploads, but information can be added manually before activation

version.label: Version
version.notes: 1 for original contribution, 6 for latest contribution if there are 6 versions, empty if the contribution is not activated, written during contribution activation

timestamp.label: Activation Timestamp
timestamp.description: Date and time of contribution activation
timestamp.notes: ISO 8601 date and time (e.g. "yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ss.sssZ"), written during contribution activation

is_validated.label: Is Validated
is_validated.description: Contribution has passed the MagIC Data Model validation

is_reviewed.label: Is Reviewed
is_reviewed.description: Contribution has been reviewed for correct usage of the MagIC Data Model

author.label: Original Author
author.description: Original author EarthRef handle or name and email

description.label: Description
examples: Fixes errors in latitudes and adds measurement data

location.label: Location Name
location.description: Name for location, dredge or drill site

sites.label: Site Names
sites.description: Colon-delimited list of the names of sites included in the result

samples.label: Sample Names
samples.description: Colon-delimited list of the names of samples included in the result

specimens.label: Specimen Names
specimens.description: Colon-delimited list of the names of specimens included in the result

experiments.label: Experiment Names
experiments.description: Colon-delimited list of the names of experiments included in the result

location_alternatives.label: Location Name Alternatives
location_alternatives.description: Colon-delimited list of alternative names and abbreviations

result_name.label: Result Name
result_name.description: Name for result or name assigned to paleomagnetic pole

result_type.label: Result Type
result_type.description: Individual (i), average (a), model (m) or stacked (s) data

result_quality.label: Result Quality
result_quality.description: Indicating if good (g) or bad (b) data

expedition_name.label: Expedition Name
expedition_name.description: Name for seagoing or land expedition

expedition_leg.label: Expedition Leg Name
expedition_leg.description: Leg number of a seagoing expedition

lithologies.label: Lithologies
lithologies.description: Colon-delimited list of lithologies or archeological classifications

plate_blocks.label: Plate or Block Name
plate_blocks.description: Colon-delimited list of plates or tectonic block names

geological_province_sections.label: Geological Province or Section Name
geological_province_sections.description: Colon-delimited list of geological provinces or section names

lat_s.label: Southernmost Latitude
lat_s.description: Southernmost latitude of the collection of sites

lat_n.label: Northernmost Latitude
lat_n.description: Northernmost latitude of the collection of sites

lon_w.label: Westernmost Longitude
lon_w.description: Westernmost longitude of the collection of sites

lon_e.label: Easternmost Longitude
lon_e.description: Easternmost longitude of the collection of sites

elevation_low.label: Elevation Low
elevation_low.description: Lowest elevation of the collection of sites

elevation_high.label: Elevation High
elevation_high.description: Highest elevation of the collection of sites

continent_ocean.label: Continent or Ocean Island Region
continent_ocean.description: Name for continent or ocean island region

ocean_sea.label: Ocean or Sea Name
ocean_sea.description: Name for location in an ocean or sea

age_sigma.label: Inferred Age Sigma
age_sigma.notes: Standard error or standard deviation at one sigma

dir_tilt_correction.label: Direction Tilt Correction
dir_tilt_correction.description: Percentage tilt correction applied to the data
dir_tilt_correction.notes: Correction between geographic (0%) and stratigraphic (100%); unoriented (-1%); partially oriented to horizontal only (-2%); unknown(-3%)

dir_dec.label: Direction Declination
dir_dec.description: Location direction in coordinates specified by tilt correction, Declination

dir_inc.label: Direction Inclination
dir_inc.description: Location direction in coordinates specified by tilt correction, Inclination

dir_alpha95.label: Direction Alpha 95%
dir_alpha95.description: Location direction in coordinates specified by tilt correction, Fisher circle

dir_r.label: Direction R
dir_r.description: Location direction in coordinates specified by tilt correction, Resultant Fisher vector

dir_k.label: Direction K
dir_k.description: Location direction in coordinates specified by tilt correction, Fisher's dispersion parameter Kappa

dir_k_ratio.label: Direction Tilt K Ratio
dir_k_ratio.description: Comparison of Fisher dispersion K after and before tilt correction

dir_n_sites.label: Direction N Sites
dir_n_sites.description: Number of sites included in directional calculations

dir_n_samples.label: Direction N Samples
dir_n_samples.description: Number of samples included in directional calculations

dir_n_specimens.label: Direction N Specimens
dir_n_specimens.description: Number of specimens included in directional calculations

dir_polarity.label: Direction Polarity
dir_polarity.description: Location direction polarity is normal (n), reversed (r), transitional (t), excursion (e) or intermediate (i)

fold_test_significance.label: Fold Test Significance
fold_test_significance.description: Significance level achieved in tilt correction calculations

fold_test.label: Fold Test
fold_test.description: Classification and result of the folding test

conglomerate_test.label: Conglomerate Test
conglomerate_test.description: Classification and result of the (intra-formational) conglomerate test

contact_test.label: Baked Contact Test
contact_test.description: Classification and result of the (inverse) contact test

reversal_test.label: Reversal Test
reversal_test.description: Classification and result of the reversal test

pole_lat.label: Pole Latitude
pole_lat.description: Pole latitude, average of site VGP latitudes

pole_lon.label: Pole Longitude
pole_lon.description: Pole longitude, average of site VGP longitudes

pole_conf.label: Pole Confidence Ellipse
pole_conf.description: Pole, Confidence ellipse expressed as a six-element colon-delimited list of major axis eta declination, inclination and semi-angle followed by minor axis zeta declination, inclination and semi-angle

pole_n_sites.label: Pole N Sites
pole_n_sites.description: Number of sites included in pole calculations

pole_comp_name.label: Pole Component Name
pole_comp_name.description: Name of magnetic component for which pole is calculated

pole_reversed_perc.label: Percentage Reversed Sites
pole_reversed_perc.description: Percentage of sites that are reversed

pole_antipodal_angle.label: Antipodal Angle
pole_antipodal_angle.description: Great circle distance between normal and reversed poles

pole_vv_q.label: Van der Voo Q
pole_vv_q.description: Van der Voo Quality Level, Number of criteria passed

pole_bc_q.label: Besse and Courtillot Q
pole_bc_q.description: Besse and Courtillot Quality Level, Number of criteria passed

paleolat_sigma.label: Paleolatitude Sigma
paleolat_sigma.notes: Standard error or standard deviation at one sigma

paleolon_sigma.label: Paleolongitude Sigma
paleolon_sigma.notes: Standard error or standard deviation at one sigma

pdm.label: PDM
pdm.description: Paleomagnetic dipole moment, Average of site VDMs

pdm_sigma.label: PDM Sigma
pdm_sigma.notes: Standard error or standard deviation at one sigma

pdm_n_sites.label: PDM N Sites
pdm_n_sites.description: Number of sites included in PDM calculations

padm.label: PADM
padm.description: Paleomagnetic axial dipole moment, Average of site VDMs

padm_sigma.label: PADM Sigma
padm_sigma.notes: Standard error or standard deviation at one sigma

padm_n_sites.label: PADM N Sites
padm_n_sites.description: Number of sites included in PADM calculations

int_abs_sigma.label: Absolute Paleointensity Sigma
int_abs_sigma.notes: Standard error or standard deviation at one sigma

int_abs_sigma_perc.label: Absolute Paleointensity Sigma %
int_abs_sigma_perc.description: Absolute field strength, Uncertainty in percent
int_abs_sigma_perc.notes: Standard error or standard deviation at one sigma

int_n_sites.label: Paleointensity N Sites
int_n_sites.description: Number of sites included in intensity calculations

int_n_samples.label: Paleointensity N Samples
int_n_samples.description: Number of samples included in intensity calculations

int_n_specimens.label: Paleointensity N Specimens
int_n_specimens.description: Number of specimens included in intensity calculations

description.label: Description
description.description: Location and result description and comments

rock_magnetic_test.label: Rock Magnetic Test
rock_magnetic_test.description: Classification and result of the various rock magnetic tests

rotation_sequence.label: Sequence of Rotations
rotation_sequence.description: N by M matrix with N sequential rotations and the length of each row defined by the first element: the rotation type

software_packages.label: Software Packages
software_packages.description: Colon-delimited list of software used for data reduction

external_database_ids.label: External Database IDs
external_database_ids.description: Dictionary of external databases and IDs where data are used
examples: ARCHEO00[] if the ID is unknown

pis.label: Principal Investigator Names
pis.description: Colon-delimited list of EarthRef handles and/or names and emails for principal investigators who organized the expedition

scientists.label: Research Scientist Names
scientists.description: Colon-delimited list of EarthRef handles and/or names and emails for scientists who described the location

analysts.label: Analyst Names
analysts.description: Colon-delimited list of EarthRef handles and/or names and emails for analysts

sites.description: Units with a common age and magnetization

lithologies.description: Colon-delimited list of lithologies or archeological classifications

bed_dip.description: Dip of the bedding as measured to the right of strike direction

bed_dip_direction.label: Bedding Dip Direction
bed_dip_direction.description: Direction of the dip of a paleo-horizontal plane in the bedding

cooling_rate.description: Estimated ancient in-situ cooling rate per Ma

lat_sigma.description: Site geographic location averaging uncertainty, Latitude

lon_sigma.label: Longitude Sigma
lon_sigma.description: Site geographic location averaging uncertainty, Longitude

geographic_precision.description: Site geographic location, Precision in latitude and longitude

order.label: Stratigraphic Order
order.description: Site geographic location, Order in the stratigraphic section

height.label: Stratigraphic Height
height.notes: Positive is up in section or core, while negative is down relative to reference height

elevation.description: Site geographic location, Elevation relative to sealevel

aniso_tilt_correction.label: Anisotropy Tilt Correction
aniso_tilt_correction.description: Percentage tilt correction applied to the data
aniso_tilt_correction.notes: Correction between geographic (0%) and stratigraphic (100%); unoriented (-1%); partially oriented to horizontal only (-2%); unknown (-3%)

aniso_v1.label: Anisotropy V1
aniso_v1.description: Anisotropy eigenparameters for the maximum eigenvalue (T1), a colon-delimited list of tau (T1), dec, inc, confidence ellipse type, and confidence ellipse parameters

aniso_v2.label: Anisotropy V2
aniso_v2.description: Anisotropy eigenparameters for the intermediate eigenvalue (T2), a colon-delimited list of tau (T2), dec, inc, confidence ellipse type, and confidence ellipse parameters

aniso_v3.label: Anisotropy V3
aniso_v3.description: Anisotropy eigenparameters for the minimum eigenvalue (T3), a colon-delimited list of tau (T3), dec, inc, confidence ellipse type, and confidence ellipse parameters

aniso_vg.label: Anisotropy Vg
aniso_vg.description: Graham's V parameter defined by sin(V)=sqrt((K2-K3)/(K1-K3))
aniso_vg.notes: Fabric is oblate when V > 45 degrees

external_database_ids.description: Dictionary of external databases and IDs where data are used
examples: ARCHEO00[] if the ID is unknown

scientists.label: Research Scientist Names
scientists.description: Colon-delimited list of EarthRef handles and/or names and emails for scientists who described the sample

analysts.label: Analyst Names
analysts.description: Colon-delimited list of EarthRef handles and/or names and emails for analysts

specimens.label: Specimens
specimens.notes: Interpretations of measurements, depth position of measurements in the core section

experiments.label: Experiment Names
experiments.description: Colon-delimited list of the names of experiments included in the result

specimen_alternatives.label: Specimen Name Alternatives
specimen_alternatives.description: Colon-delimited list of alternative names and abbreviations

synthetic_alternatives.label: Synthetic Specimen Name Alternatives
synthetic_alternatives.description: Colon-delimited list of alternative names and abbreviations

result_type.label: Result Type
result_type.description: Individual (i), average (a), model (m) or stacked (s) data

result_quality.label: Result Quality
result_quality.description: Indicating if good (g) or bad (b) data

meas_step_min.label: Measurement Step Minimum
meas_step_min.description: Step included in calculation, Lower bound

meas_step_max.label: Measurement Step Maximum
meas_step_max.description: Step included in calculation, Higher bound

lithologies.label: Lithologies
lithologies.description: Colon-delimited list of lithologies or archeological classifications

azimuth.label: Azimuth
azimuth.description: Azimuth of sample's X direction measured clockwise from north

dip.label: Dip
dip.description: Dip of specimen's X direction measured from the horizontal

dir_tilt_correction.label: Direction Tilt Correction
dir_tilt_correction.description: Percentage tilt correction applied to the data
dir_tilt_correction.notes: Correction between geographic (0%) and stratigraphic (100%); unoriented (-1%); partially oriented to horizontal only (-2%); unknown(-3%)

dir_dec.label: Direction Declination
dir_dec.description: Specimen direction in coordinates specified by tilt correction, Declination

dir_inc.label: Direction Inclination
dir_inc.description: Specimen direction in coordinates specified by tilt correction, Inclination

dir_alpha95.label: Direction Alpha 95%
dir_alpha95.description: Specimen direction in coordinates specified by tilt correction, Fisher circle

dir_r.label: Direction R
dir_r.description: Specimen direction in coordinates specified by tilt correction, Resultant Fisher vector

dir_k.label: Direction K
dir_k.description: Specimen direction in coordinates specified by tilt correction, Fisher's dispersion parameter Kappa

dir_k_ratio.label: Direction Tilt K Ratio
dir_k_ratio.description: Comparison of Fisher dispersion K after and before tilt correction

dir_n_measurements.label: Direction N Measurements
dir_n_measurements.description: Number of measurements included in directional calculations

dir_n_comps.label: Direction N Components
dir_n_comps.description: Total number of specimen magnetic components

dir_polarity.label: Direction Polarity
dir_polarity.description: Specimen direction polarity is normal (n), reversed (r), transitional (t), excursion (e) or intermediate (i)

dir_nrm_origin.label: Direction NRM Origin
dir_nrm_origin.description: Origin of the specimen direction NRM is primary (p) or secondary (s)

dir_mad_anc.label: Direction MAD Anchored
dir_mad_anc.description: Maximum Angular Deviation (MAD) of the anchored directional PCA fits to the paleomagnetic vector

dir_mad_free.label: Direction MAD Free-Floating
dir_mad_free.description: Maximum Angular Deviation (MAD) of the free-floating directional PCA fits to the paleomagnetic vector

dir_alpha.label: Direction Alpha
dir_alpha.description: Angular difference between the anchored and free-floating best-fit directions on a vector component diagram

dir_dang.label: Direction DANG
dir_dang.description: Deviation angle of direction of component with respect to origin

magn_volume.label: Magnetization Volume
magn_volume.description: Measured intensity of magnetization, Volume normalized

magn_mass.label: Magnetization Mass
magn_mass.description: Measured intensity of magnetization, Mass normalized

int_abs_sigma.label: Absolute Paleointensity Sigma
int_abs_sigma.notes: Standard error or standard deviation at one sigma

int_abs_sigma_perc.label: Absolute Paleointensity Sigma %
int_abs_sigma_perc.description: Absolute field strength, Uncertainty in percent
int_abs_sigma_perc.notes: Standard error or standard deviation at one sigma

int_rel_sigma.label: Relative Paleointensity Sigma
int_rel_sigma.notes: Standard error or standard deviation at one sigma

int_rel_sigma_perc.label: Relative Paleointensity Sigma %
int_rel_sigma_perc.description: Relative field strength, Uncertainty in percent
int_rel_sigma_perc.notes: Standard error or standard deviation at one sigma

int_rel_ARM.label: ARM Normalized Relative Paleointensity
int_rel_ARM.description: Relative field strength estimated with NRM normalized by laboratory ARM

int_rel_ARM_sigma.label: ARM Normalized Relative Paleointensity Sigma
int_rel_ARM_sigma.description: Relative field strength estimated with NRM normalized by laboratory ARM, Uncertainty
int_rel_ARM_sigma.notes: Standard error or standard deviation at one sigma

int_rel_ARM_sigma_perc.label: ARM Normalized Relative Paleointensity Sigma %
int_rel_ARM_sigma_perc.description: Relative field strength estimated with NRM normalized by laboratory ARM, Uncertainty in percent
int_rel_ARM_sigma_perc.notes: Standard error or standard deviation at one sigma

int_rel_IRM.label: IRM Normalized Relative Paleointensity
int_rel_IRM.description: Relative field strength estimated with NRM normalized by laboratory IRM

int_rel_IRM_sigma.label: IRM Normalized Relative Paleointensity Sigma
int_rel_IRM_sigma.description: Relative field strength estimated with NRM normalized by laboratory IRM, Uncertainty
int_rel_IRM_sigma.notes: Standard error or standard deviation at one sigma

int_rel_IRM_sigma_perc.label: IRM Normalized Relative Paleointensity Sigma %
int_rel_IRM_sigma_perc.description: Relative field strength estimated with NRM normalized by laboratory IRM, Uncertainty in percent
int_rel_IRM_sigma_perc.notes: Standard error or standard deviation at one sigma

int_rel_chi.label: Susceptibility Normalized Relative Paleointensity
int_rel_chi.description: Relative field strength estimated with NRM normalized by susceptibility

int_rel_chi_sigma.label: Susceptibility Normalized Relative Paleointensity Sigma
int_rel_chi_sigma.description: Relative field strength estimated with NRM normalized by susceptibility, Uncertainty
int_rel_chi_sigma.notes: Standard error or standard deviation at one sigma

int_rel_chi_sigma_perc.label: Susceptibility Normalized Relative Paleointensity Sigma %
int_rel_chi_sigma_perc.description: Relative field strength estimated with NRM normalized by susceptibility, Uncertainty in percent
int_rel_chi_sigma_perc.notes: Standard error or standard deviation at one sigma

int_n_measurements.label: Paleointensity N Measurements
int_n_measurements.description: Number of measurements included in intensity calculations

int_corr.label: Paleointensity Data Corrected
int_corr.description: Indicating if an uncorrected (u) or corrected (c) estimate with regard to possible anisotropy and cooling rate corrections

int_corr_cooling_rate.label: Paleointensity Correction Cooling Rate
int_corr_cooling_rate.description: Cooling rate correction factor for intensity

int_corr_nlt.label: Paleointensity Correction Non-Linear TRM
int_corr_nlt.description: Non-linear TRM correction factor for intensity

int_b.label: Paleointensity Best-fit Line Slope
int_b.description: The slope of the best-fit line of the selected TRM and NRM points on an Arai plot

int_b_sigma.label: Paleointensity Best-fit Line Slope Sigma
int_b_sigma.description: The standard error on the slope on an Arai plot

int_b_beta.label: Paleointensity Best-fit Line Slope Sigma over Slope
int_b_beta.description: The ratio of the standard error of the slope to the absolute value of the slope on an Arai plot

int_f.label: Paleointensity f
int_f.description: NRM fraction used for the best-fit on an Arai plot

int_fvds.label: Paleointensity f VDS
int_fvds.description: NRM fraction used for the best-fit on an Arai plot calculated as a vector difference sum

int_frac.label: Paleointensity FRAC
int_frac.description: NRM fraction used for the best-fit on an Arai plot determined entirely by vector difference sum calculation

int_g.label: Paleointensity Gap Factor
int_g.description: The gap reflects the average spacing of the selected Arai plot points along the best-fit line

int_gmax.label: Paleointensity Gap Max
int_gmax.description: The maximum gap between two points in Arai plot determined by vector arithmetic

int_q.label: Paleointensity q
int_q.description: A measure of the overall quality of the paleointensity estimate and combines the relative scatter of the best-fit line, the NRM fraction and the gap factor

int_k.label: Paleointensity K
int_k.description: The curvature of the Arai plot as determined by the best-fit circle to all of the data

int_k_sse.label: Paleointensity K SSE
int_k_sse.description: The quality of the best-fit circle used to determine K

int_k_prime.label: Paleointensity K'
int_k_prime.description: The curvature of the Arai plot as determined by the best-fit circle to the selected interval of data

int_k_prime_sse.label: Paleointensity K' SSE
int_k_prime_sse.description: The quality of the best-fit circle used to determine K'

int_scat.label: Paleointensity SCAT
int_scat.description: All pTRM checks, MD checks, IZ ZI data, etc. are in the box

int_r2_corr.label: Paleointensity Correlation Coefficient
int_r2_corr.description: The correlation coefficient to estimate the strength of the linear relationship between the NRM and TRM over the best-fit Arai plot segment

int_r2_det.label: Paleointensity Coefficient of Determination
int_r2_det.description: The coefficient of determination to estimate variance accounted for by the linear model fit on an Arai plot

int_z.label: Paleointensity Z
int_z.description: Arai plot zigzag parameter calculated using the scatter around the best-fit slope on an Arai plot

int_z_md.label: Paleointensity IZZI MD
int_z_md.description: Arai plot zigzag parameter calculated by the area bounded by the curve that the ZI points make and the curve that the IZ points make

int_mad_anc.label: Paleointensity MAD Anchored
int_mad_anc.description: Maximum Angular Deviation (MAD) of the anchored directional PCA fits to the paleomagnetic vector from a paleointensity experiment

int_mad_free.label: Paleointensity MAD Free-Floating
int_mad_free.description: Maximum Angular Deviation (MAD) of the free-floating directional PCA fits to the paleomagnetic vector from a paleointensity experiment

int_alpha.label: Paleointensity Alpha
int_alpha.description: Angular difference between the anchored and free-floating best-fit directions on a vector component diagram from a paleointensity experiment

int_alpha_prime.label: Paleointensity Alpha Prime
int_alpha_prime.description: Angular difference between the anchored best-fit direction from the paleointensity experiment and an independent measure of the paleomagnetic direction

int_delta.label: Paleointensity Delta
int_delta.description: Maximum angle of deviation between assumed NRM and measured NRM in perpendicular paleointensity method

int_theta.label: Paleointensity Theta
int_theta.description: The angle between the applied field direction and the ChRM direction of the NRM as determined from the free-floating PCA fit to the selected demagnetization steps of the paleointensity experiment

int_dang.label: Paleointensity DANG
int_dang.description: The angle between the free-floating best-fit direction and the vector connecting the center of mass and the origin of the vector component diagram

int_gamma.label: Paleointensity Gamma
int_gamma.description: Maximum angle of deviation between acquired pTRM direction and assumed applied field direction

int_crm.label: Paleointensity CRM %
int_crm.description: The cumulative deflection between the NRM vectors and the ChRM direction

int_ptrm.label: Paleointensity Maximum pTRM Check
int_ptrm.description: Maximum absolute difference produced by a pTRM check, normalized by the TRM acquired at that heating step

int_dck.label: Paleointensity Delta CK
int_dck.description: Maximum absolute difference produced by a pTRM check, normalized by the total TRM (obtained from the intersection of the best-fit line and the x-axis on an Arai plot)

int_drat.label: Paleointensity Difference Ratio pTRM Check
int_drat.description: Maximum absolute difference produced by a pTRM check, normalized by the length of the best-fit line

int_maxdev.label: Paleointensity Maximum DEV
int_maxdev.description: Maximum absolute difference produced by a pTRM check, normalized by the length of the TRM segment of the best-fit line on an Arai plot

int_cdrat.label: Paleointensity Cumulative DRAT
int_cdrat.description: Cumulative difference ratio difference produced by a pTRM check

int_drats.label: Paleointensity Difference Ratio Sum
int_drats.description: Cumulative pTRM check difference normalized by the pTRM gained at the maximum temperature used for the best-fit on the Arai plot

int_mdrat.label: Paleointensity Mean DRAT
int_mdrat.description: The average difference produced by a pTRM check, normalized by the length of the best-fit line

int_mdev.label: Paleointensity Mean DEV
int_mdev.description: Mean deviation of a pTRM check

int_dpal.label: Paleointensity Delta pal
int_dpal.description: A measure of cumulative alteration determined by the difference of the alteration corrected intensity estimate (Valet et al., 1996) and the uncorrected estimate, normalized by the uncorrected estimate (Leonhardt et al., 2004a)

int_n_ptrm.label: Paleointensity Number pTRM Checks
int_n_ptrm.description: Number of pTRM checks used in paleointensity experiment

int_drat_tail.label: Paleointensity DRAT Tail Check
int_drat_tail.description: Maximum absolute difference produced by a pTRM tail check, normalized by the length of the best-fit line

int_dtr.label: Paleointensity Delta TR
int_dtr.description: Maximum absolute difference produced by a pTRM tail check, normalized by the NRM (obtained from the intersection of the best-fit line and the y-axis on an Arai plot)

int_md.label: Paleointensity MD VDS
int_md.description: Maximum absolute difference produced by a pTRM tail check, normalized by the vector difference sum of the NRM

int_dt.label: Paleointensity Delta T
int_dt.description: The extent of a pTRM tail after correction for angular dependence

int_n_ptrm_tail.label: Paleointensity Number pTRM Tail Checks
int_n_ptrm_tail.description: Number of pTRM tail checks used in paleointensity experiment

int_dac.label: Paleointensity Delta AC
int_dac.description: The maximum absolute additivity check difference normalized by the total TRM (obtained from the intersection of the best-fit line and the x-axis on an Arai plot

int_n_ac.label: Paleointensity N Additivity Checks
int_n_ac.description: The number of additivity checks used to analyze the best-fit segment on an Arai plot

critical_temp.label: Critical Temperature
critical_temp.description: Temperature at which some transition occurs

critical_temp_low.label: Critical Temperature Low
critical_temp_low.description: Critical, Xfd or Xhd temperature calculation, Low range

critical_temp_high.label: Critical Temperature High
critical_temp_high.description: Critical, Xfd or Xhd temperature calculation, High range

aniso_tilt_correction.label: Anisotropy Tilt Correction
aniso_tilt_correction.description: Percentage tilt correction applied to the data
aniso_tilt_correction.notes: Correction between geographic (0%) and stratigraphic (100%); unoriented (-1%); partially oriented to horizontal only (-2%); unknown (-3%)

aniso_alt.label: Anisotropy Remanence Alteration
aniso_alt.description: Comparison of 1st and 2nd TRMs in TRM anisotropy experiment

aniso_s.label: Anisotropy Tensor Elements
aniso_s.description: Anisotropy tensor diagonal elements, a six-element colon-delimited list of c11, c22, c33, c12, c23, and c13 tensor elements

aniso_s_n_measurements.label: Anisotropy N Measurements
aniso_s_n_measurements.description: Number of measurements included in anisotropy tensor calculations

aniso_v1.label: Anisotropy V1
aniso_v1.description: Anisotropy eigenparameters for the maximum eigenvalue (T1), a colon-delimited list of tau (T1), dec, inc, confidence ellipse type, and confidence ellipse parameters

aniso_v2.label: Anisotropy V2
aniso_v2.description: Anisotropy eigenparameters for the intermediate eigenvalue (T2), a colon-delimited list of tau (T2), dec, inc, confidence ellipse type, and confidence ellipse parameters

aniso_v3.label: Anisotropy V3
aniso_v3.description: Anisotropy eigenparameters for the minimum eigenvalue (T3), a colon-delimited list of tau (T3), dec, inc, confidence ellipse type, and confidence ellipse parameters

aniso_vg.label: Anisotropy Vg
aniso_vg.description: Graham's V parameter defined by sin(V)=sqrt((K2-K3)/(K1-K3))
aniso_vg.notes: Fabric is oblate when V > 45 degrees

hyst_ss.label: Hysteresis S*
hyst_ss.description: Curvature of major loop in upper left quadrant

hyst_mr_moment.label: Hysteresis Mr Moment
hyst_mr_moment.description: Measured intensity of remanent magnetization, Moment

hyst_mr_volume.label: Hysteresis Mr Volume
hyst_mr_volume.description: Measured intensity of remanent magnetization, Volume normalized

hyst_mr_mass.label: Hysteresis Mr Mass
hyst_mr_mass.description: Measured intensity of remanent magnetization, Mass normalized

hyst_ms_moment.label: Hysteresis Ms Moment
hyst_ms_moment.description: Measured intensity of saturation magnetization, Moment

hyst_ms_volume.label: Hysteresis Ms Volume
hyst_ms_volume.description: Measured intensity of saturation magnetization, Volume normalized

hyst_ms_mass.label: Hysteresis Ms Mass
hyst_ms_mass.description: Measured intensity of saturation magnetization, Mass normalized

hyst_mr_ms.label: Hysteresis Mr over Ms
hyst_mr_ms.description: Ratio of saturation remanence to saturation

hyst_bcr_bc.label: Hysteresis Bcr over Bc
hyst_bcr_bc.description: Ratio of coercivity of remanence over coercivity

hyst_bc_offset.label: Hysteresis Bc Offset
hyst_bc_offset.description: Offset between coercivity in positive and negative fields

hyst_th.label: Hysteresis Transient Magnetization
hyst_th.description: Transient energy dissipation related to domain state

rem_dfc_moment.label: Remanence Delta Field Cooled Moment
rem_dfc_moment.description: Fractional remanence loss at Tv (80K,130K) after field cooling, Moment

rem_dfc_volume.label: Remanence Delta Field Cooled Volume
rem_dfc_volume.description: Fractional remanence loss at Tv (80K,130K) after field cooling, Volume normalized

rem_dfc_mass.label: Remanence Delta Field Cooled Mass
rem_dfc_mass.description: Fractional remanence loss at Tv (80K,130K) after field cooling, Mass normalized

rem_dzfc_moment.label: Remanence Delta Zerofield Cooled Moment
rem_dzfc_moment.description: Fractional remanence loss at Tv (80K,130K) after zero-field cooling, Moment

rem_dzfc_volume.label: Remanence Delta Zerofield Cooled Volume
rem_dzfc_volume.description: Fractional remanence loss at Tv (80K,130K) after zero-field cooling, Volume normalized

rem_dzfc_mass.label: Remanence Delta Zerofield Cooled Mass
rem_dzfc_mass.description: Fractional remanence loss at Tv (80K,130K) after zero-field cooling, Mass normalized

rem_delta_temp_low.label: Remanence Delta Temperature Low
rem_delta_temp_low.description: Low Temperature of delta FC/ZFC calculation

rem_delta_temp_high.label: Remanence Delta Temperature High
rem_delta_temp_high.description: High Temperature of delta FC/ZFC calculation

rem_mr_moment.label: Remanence Mr Moment
rem_mr_moment.description: Measured intensity of remanent moment, Moment

rem_mr_volume.label: Remanence Mr Volume
rem_mr_volume.description: Measured intensity of remanent moment, Volume normalized

rem_mr_mass.label: Remanence Mr Mass
rem_mr_mass.description: Measured intensity of remanent moment, Mass normalized

rem_sratio_forward.label: Remanence S Ratio Forward Field
rem_sratio_forward.description: SIRM field used to calculate S Ratio

rem_sratio_back.label: Remanence S Ratio Back Field
rem_sratio_back.description: Backfield used to calculate S Ratio

rem_hirm_moment.label: Remanence HIRM Moment
rem_hirm_moment.description: Hard IRM factor, HIRM = SIRM - IRM(300 mT), Moment

rem_hirm_volume.label: Remanence HIRM Volume
rem_hirm_volume.description: Hard IRM factor, HIRM = SIRM - IRM(300 mT), Volume normalized

rem_hirm_mass.label: Remanence HIRM Mass
rem_hirm_mass.description: Hard IRM factor, HIRM = SIRM - IRM(300 mT), Mass normalized

rem_cross_over.label: Remanence Cross Over Point
rem_cross_over.description: Field at which demagnetization moment equals acquisition moment

rem_sa.label: Remanence Sa
rem_sa.description: Viscosity coefficient dM/d(log t) during the acquisition of viscous remanence

rem_sd.label: Remanence Sd
rem_sd.description: Decay in the viscosity coefficient dM/d(log t) during the acquisition of viscous remanence

susc_loss_tangent.label: Susceptibility Loss Tangent
susc_loss_tangent.description: Loss tangent or X(quadrature) over X(inphase)

susc_lab_field_ac_high.label: Susceptibility Max Lab AC Field
susc_lab_field_ac_high.description: Maximum or peak lab AC field applied during measurement
susc_lab_field_ac_high.notes: No field equals 0 and ambient field equals -1

description.label: Description
description.description: Specimen and result description and comments

rotation_sequence.label: Sequence of Rotations
rotation_sequence.description: N by M matrix with N sequential rotations and the length of each row defined by the first element: the rotation type

software_packages.label: Software Packages
software_packages.description: Colon-delimited list of software used for data reduction

external_database_ids.label: External Database IDs
external_database_ids.description: Dictionary of external databases and IDs where data are used
examples: ARCHEO00[] if the ID is unknown

scientists.label: Research Scientist Names
scientists.description: Colon-delimited list of EarthRef handles and/or names and emails for scientists who described the specimen

analysts.label: Analyst Names
analysts.description: Colon-delimited list of EarthRef handles and/or names and emails for analysts

standard.label: Measurement Standard
standard.description: Indicating if a standard (s) or an unknown (u) measurement

quality.label: Measurement Quality
quality.description: Indicating if a good (g) or bad (b) measurement

treat_temp_decay_rate.label: Lab Treatment Temperature Decay Rate
treat_temp_decay_rate.description: Decay rate of temperature on cooling

treat_temp_dc_on.label: Lab Treatment Temperature DC Field On
treat_temp_dc_on.description: Temperature in a pTRM experiment at which DC field is turned on

treat_temp_dc_off.label: Lab Treatment Temperature DC Field Off
treat_temp_dc_off.description: Temperature in a pTRM experiment at which DC field is turned off

treat_ac_field.label: Lab Treatment AC Field
treat_ac_field.description: Peak field in AC demagnetization experiment

treat_ac_field_decay_rate.label: Lab Treatment AC Field Decay Rate
treat_ac_field_decay_rate.description: Decay rate of AC field in AC field demagnetization experiment

treat_ac_field_dc_on.label: Lab Treatment AC Field DC Field On
treat_ac_field_dc_on.description: AC field in a pARM experiment at which DC field is turned on

treat_ac_field_dc_off.label: Lab Treatment AC Field DC Field Off
treat_ac_field_dc_off.description: AC field in a pARM experiment at which DC field is turned off

treat_dc_field_decay_rate.label: Lab Treatment DC Field Decay Rate
treat_dc_field_decay_rate.description: Decay rate of DC field after switching off

treat_dc_field_ac_on.label: Lab Treatment DC Field AC Field On
treat_dc_field_ac_on.description: DC field in DC field experiment at which AC field is turned on

treat_dc_field_ac_off.label: Lab Treatment DC Field AC Field Off
treat_dc_field_ac_off.description: DC field in DC field experiment at which AC field is turned off

treat_dc_field_phi.label: Lab Treatment Orientation Phi
treat_dc_field_phi.description: Orientation of the lab field with respect for the specimen

treat_dc_field_theta.label: Lab Treatment Orientation Theta
treat_dc_field_theta.description: Orientation of the lab field with respect for the specimen

treat_mw_time.label: Lab Treatment MW Time
treat_mw_time.description: Time (in seconds) of microwave power application

treat_mw_energy.label: Lab Treatment MW Energy
treat_mw_energy.description: Applied microwave power integrated over total application time

treat_mw_integral.label: Lab Treatment MW Power Integral
treat_mw_integral.description: Absorbed microwave energy, Applied microwave energy minus reflected microwave energy

meas_pos_x.label: Measurement X Position
meas_pos_x.description: Position of the measurement relative to an arbitrary origin on the specimen, X

meas_pos_y.label: Measurement Y Position
meas_pos_y.description: Position of the measurement relative to an arbitrary origin on the specimen, Y

meas_pos_z.label: Measurement Z Position
meas_pos_z.description: Position of the measurement relative to an arbitrary origin on the specimen, Z

meas_n_orient.label: Measurement N Orientations
meas_n_orient.description: Number of different orientations in measurement

meas_temp_change.label: Measurement Temperature Change
meas_temp_change.description: Change in temperature during each measurement step

meas_field_ac.label: Measurement Lab AC Field
meas_field_ac.description: Lab AC field applied during measurement
meas_field_ac.notes: No field equals 0 and ambient field equals -1

meas_field_dc.label: Measurement Lab DC Field
meas_field_dc.description: Lab DC field applied during measurement

magn_x_sigma.label: Magnetic Field X Sigma
magn_x_sigma.notes: Standard error or standard deviation at one sigma

magn_y_sigma.label: Magnetic Field Y Sigma
magn_y_sigma.notes: Standard error or standard deviation at one sigma

magn_z_sigma.label: Magnetic Field Z Sigma
magn_z_sigma.notes: Standard error or standard deviation at one sigma

magn_xyz_sigma.label: Standard Deviation
magn_xyz_sigma.description: Standard deviation in measurements, Average X, Y and Z directions
magn_xyz_sigma.notes: Standard error or standard deviation at one sigma

magn_r2_det.label: Coefficient of Determination
magn_r2_det.description: Goodness of fit in regression, R squared

dir_csd.label: Circular Standard Deviation
dir_csd.notes: Standard error or standard deviation at one sigma

magn_volume.label: Magnetization Volume
magn_volume.description: Measured intensity of magnetization, Volume normalized

magn_mass.label: Magnetization Mass
magn_mass.description: Measured intensity of magnetization, Mass normalized

hyst_sweep_rate.label: Measurement Hysteresis Sweep Rate
hyst_sweep_rate.description: Rate of field sweep during a hysteresis loop measurement

timestamp.label: Measurement Timestamp
timestamp.description: Date and time when the measurement occured

software_packages.label: MagIC Software Packages
software_packages.description: Colon-delimited list of software used for data reduction

external_database_ids.label: External Database IDs
external_database_ids.description: Dictionary of external databases and IDs where data are used
examples: ARCHEO00[] if the ID is unknown

analysts.label: Analyst Names
analysts.description: Colon-delimited list of EarthRef handles and/or names and emails for analysts

criteria.label: Criteria
criteria.notes: Define criterion logical operations on data

table_column.label: MagIC Column Name
table_column.description: MagIC data model table and column name

criterion_value.label: Criterion Value
criterion_value.description: Criterion value which, when evaluated to a logical truth using the criterion operation on the data in the field, determines the records that pass the criterion

location.label: Location Name
location.description: Name for location, dredge or drill site

tiepoint_alternatives.label: Tiepoint Name Alternatives
tiepoint_alternatives.description: Colon-delimited list of alternative names and abbreviations

tiepoint_height.label: Tiepoint Stratigraphic Height
tiepoint_height.description: Tiepoint stratigraphic height relative to reference tiepoint
tiepoint_height.notes: Positive is up in section or core, while negative is down relative to reference height

tiepoint_height_sigma.label: Tiepoint Stratigraphic Height Sigma
tiepoint_height_sigma.notes: Standard error or standard deviation at one sigma

age_sigma.label: Age Sigma
age_sigma.notes: Standard error or standard deviation at one sigma

images.label: Images
images.notes: Batch uploads with images or plots, but information can be added manually before activation

location.label: Location Name
location.description: Name for location, dredge or drill site

title.label: Title
examples: High tech solutions for being lonely at sea

keywords.label: Keywords
keywords.description: Colon delimited list of keywords associated with image

timestamp.label: Creation Timestamp
timestamp.description: UTC Date and time of when image was taken or created

software_packages.label: Software Packages
software_packages.description: Colon-delimited list of software used for generating the plot

analysts.label: Analyst Names
